homePage.title: Do you need help with Regata OS?
homePage.description: This is the Regata OS troubleshooting center.</br>We have separated some options here that can help you solve some problems.</br>
homePage.communityText: If you still haven't found what you're looking for, ask the community using our Telegram group.

networkOption.title: Troubleshoot network</br>problems
networkOption.text: If you are having problems with your internet connection, this option is recommended for you.

repoOption.title: Update software repositories</br>manually
repoOption.text: Update software repositories manually. This can help troubleshoot problems.

restoreOption.title: Restore the default settings</br>of the graphical environment
restoreOption.text: Restore the default settings of the Regata OS graphical environment. Restart required.

cleanupOption.title: Disk cleanup
cleanupOption.text: Scan and remove unnecessary files such as cache, logs and temporary files to free up disk space.

infoOption.title: Get detailed hardware information
infoOption.text: A text file will be created in your personal folder with important information about the hardware.

cleanupPage.pageDesc: Scan your system for unnecessary files and free up disk space.
cleanupPage.scanPromptText: Click the button below to scan your system for files that can be safely removed.
cleanupPage.doneDesc: {size} of disk space has been freed.

package-cache.title: Package cache
package-cache.desc: Cached packages downloaded by the package manager.

system-logs.title: Old system logs
system-logs.desc: Rotated and compressed log files in /var/log.

user-cache.title: User cache
user-cache.desc: Application cache files in your home directory.

thumbnails.title: Thumbnail cache
thumbnails.desc: Image thumbnails generated by the file manager.
